I'm doing well, just enjoying the beautiful weather and working in my garden.
That's lovely! I've been wanting to start a garden myself, any tips for a beginner?
It's very rewarding, though definitely takes some work. What are you thinking of growing?
Maybe some herbs and tomatoes to start.
Those are both great choices, relatively easy to care for too.
I recently started listening to classical music while I work.
Oh, I love classical music! Do you have any favorite composers?
I'm still exploring, but I really like Mozart so far.
A classic choice! Have you heard his Piano Concerto No. 21?
No, I'll have to look that one up!
It's one of my absolute favorites.
